mapper.select: select like_status from community_up where consumer_id = #{consumer_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.delete: delete from community_up where consumer_id = #{consumer_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and community_id = #{community_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
